name: Yicheng Shen
first_line: I'm an ML/AI engineer who enjoys building intelligent systems.
second_line: When I'm not training models or shipping products, you'll probably find me lifting, hiking, or experimenting with AI-generated music. I also like turning messy real-world workflows into clean, automated pipelines, especially by building AI tools and agents for financial research and analysis.
third_line: I earned my MSE in Computer and Information Science from the University of Pennsylvania, and previously received my BA in Computer Science from Boston College.
forth_line: In the past, my research focused on designing simulators for distributed machine learning in edge/vehicular-cloud environments and studying fault-tolerant broadcast protocols for modern systems, including cryptocurrency and IoT applications.
